name: Stream - Tolbek + Clones Widescreen v.14
description:
For Large screen:
Use all the windows size for less scrolling....
Now with a Dark flavour ...
It's for TOBLEK-like variants site...
Original site:
Tolbek (CLOSED 06.2020):

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

additional_info: For other TOBLEK variants: To find them you can use my: Stream - DuckDuckGo - Streaming Helper This userstyle signal all false streaming sites and others bad things around them. Don't lost your time with them.... NEW 22.09.2020: Now, they change the way to serve theire movies: - they use HDLS / m3u8, which can't be downloaded with "FlashGot" or "Easy Video Downloader" as before So to download a movie here, you need now: The Stream Detector, by rowrawer: To copy the real link of the video. And Youtube-dlG - Fork odf youtube-dl, with infterface GUI [Korben Blog in french] Here the direct link to the app: youtube-dl-gui [a GitHub Project] Other alternative(I test / use it): TartubeWorks with YouTube, BitChute, and hundreds of other websites It's in it you paste this URL of the video to download it.... Example of these link: http://168.119.116.79/hls/2e2a4ad0de8f2a29fe84420ace085a14/2e2a4ad0de8f2a29fe84420ace085a14.m3u8 I think it is possible too to rename the movie title before start downloading - not tested no... And download! Another Problem: The downloaded movie, as far i have the only good method, can't be play in VLC (but work in the Media Player of Windows...). So, hmmmf, we need to convert them, with a tool like: Any Video Converter Freeware and convert it to another format. Yet, i use to convert to SONY TV.... It work well: after conversion , i can play the movie in VLC. More infos : - youtube-dl: Get the videos you want to keep [Reddit] - Comment utiliser et maitriser Youtube-dl pour télécharger des vidéos comme un champion ? - youtube-dl - README [GitHub] - youtube-dl-gui [GitHub] - The Stream Detector [Firefox addon] NOTE from before changes: If you want download movie from them, you can't use FlashGot (which fail here, by only downloading 1ko of the movie). On these sites, you need to use: Easy Video Downloader Easy to use you can to, before downloading, rename the movie. But not working anymore since recent changes in these "Tolbek-variants" sites.
